item.title: Neil Young Leaves Facebook Over “Unconscionable” Policies for AI Chatbot Conversations With Children
item.description: The singer’s decision follows a report from Reuters this week regarding internal documents at Meta that said chatbots can “engage a child in conversations that are romantic or sensual.”
